QuestData.Title: Strange Brew
QuestData.Description: If I'm going to start this vacation out right, then I'm going to need more brew. Unfortunately, the elves know nothing of the fine art of fermentation.$B$BI overheard that the Bloodmaul ogres down in the ravine have plenty. I'm willing to give it a try.$B$BDo me a favor? Head south through the Living Grove and then down the ramp to the east into Bloodmaul Outpost and procure me some? I hear they have big barrels of it laying around and that their brewmasters carry it around to all the other ogres.
QuestData.CompletionText: It's getting pretty dry around here. How am I supposed to enjoy my vacation without something to drink?
QuestData.RewardText: What is that smell? Oh no, don't tell me that's the ogre brew?!$B$BI'm almost afraid to try this stuff out. Oh well, what the hell? Bottoms up!
